title: Stippling
synopsis:
A music video for one of Ensemble Star's newest units, Double Face, of their song Stippling.

The song is part of the Ensemble Stars!! Idol Song Season1 Double Face album. 

Double Face is a mysterious, underground Idol unit. Madara Mikejima and Kohaku Oukawa continue to do activities with their original units, MaM and Crazy:B respectively, but they've begun doing activities as a two-person unit as well.
